name: Therap-easy
description:
With our treatment, dealing with trauma is easy. That's a Therap-easy guarantee!
--

A short Warioware style action/puzzle game made for the SA Game Jam 2022 (72 hours), with the theme "So much easier than in real life".

Controls are simple: 
Moving - Arrow keys
Interact - Space
Go back (where applicable) - Esc
Mute sound - M
Change volume - ] and [

--

Everything made by me, Jaco van Hemert, in 72 hours. I used Unity, LibreSprite, LMMS, and Audacity.
